text: Tessa Peake-Jones (born 9 May 1957) is an English actress. She is best known for her role as Raquel in the BBC sitcom Only Fools and Horses. She played this role from December 1988 until the programme ended in 2003. == References == == Other websites == * * Appeared in Tom Jones as Bridget Allworthy, 1997 BBC production Category:1957 births Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:People from Hammersmith Category:Actors from London Category:Living people
title: Tessa Peake-Jones
